metadata.name: Generic PLA
metadata.author: community
metadata.description: Universal PLA profile compatible with most PLA filaments

config.name: Generic PLA
config.filament_notes: Generic PLA profile suitable for most PLA filaments. Adjust temperatures as needed for specific brands.
config.start_filament_gcode:
; Generic PLA start gcode
M104 S[first_layer_temperature] ; set extruder temp
M140 S[first_layer_bed_temperature] ; set bed temp
M190 S[first_layer_bed_temperature] ; wait for bed temp
M109 S[first_layer_temperature] ; wait for extruder temp
config.end_filament_gcode:
; Generic PLA end gcode
M104 S0 ; turn off temperature
M140 S0 ; turn off heatbed
M107 ; turn off fan
